Answers Homework 2
1)  numin = 37667/1000000 = 0.037667
2)  d
	hoeffding inequality
	P[|nu - mu| > eps] <= 2 exp(-2 * eps^2 * N)
3)	e
4)	b
	1 - lambda + (2*lambda - 1) * mu
5)	48.78835002/1000 = 0.04878835002
6)	47952/1000*1000 = 0.047952
7)	1281/1000 = 1.281
8)	560.290924055/1000 = 0.560290924055
9)	-0.991529298  
	-0.000346189865
	-0.000379354533
	-0.00197919519
   	1.55901722   
   	1.55624904
10)	126058/1000*1000 = 0.126058
